thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: JESS R.

author: JESS R.
title: JESS R.
text: To start, the price is excellent compared to any other optometrist or contact lens website. At around the time they were supposed to ship, I received an email saying that my particular contacts were back-ordered, which was disappointing. However, I was given an accurate additional wait time before my order would be shipped. Everything arrived safely, with everything correct. Overall I'm very pleased with OptiContacts and look forward to re-ordering in the future.
